name: Dragon Warlord
description:
BATTLE, COLLECT, ENHANCE & EVOLVE DRAGONS! Collect all dragons to become the DRAGON WARLORD!

Collect, grow and train your dragons for battle! Customize your set of dragons and team up to fight against other players to be the champion. Do missions with your dragons to gain experiences and collect all the dragons in the wild to enhance and evolve. Finally hunt down legendary dragons to prove yourself to be the true Dragon Warlord!

GAME FEATURES:

- Collect the Dragons -
Legendary Dragon eggs are hidden all over the place! Collect your dragon in many possible ways!

- Level up & enhance -
Enhance your dragons to the highest rank by using potions and gathering from missions.

- Evolving System -
Mate your two best dragons and hatch the legendary! Match dragons with ranks to achieve higher stats.

- Real-time based dragon battle -
Make your own dragon army and be notorious in dragon world! Real-time online battle will bring you

- Various missions, stages & Bosses –
Tons of adventurous mission and mighty boss monster awaits your challenge. Get experience and gold through the mission!
